page.title: 09THE DENTON DAY CENTRE...
page.content: The Denton Day Centre is a club for elderly and handicapped people.This club is held every Wednesday from 10 a.m. until 3 p.m. in Methwold village hall.The club is organised by a committee and is run by seven voluntary helpers . During the morning the members are involved in a variety of handicrafts, i.e. basket work, weaving, sewing and knitting. Their lunch is brought from the High School where it is cooked in the school canteen, and then in the afternoon they play card games or bingo, and sometimes they are entertained by other groups in the village. Members are brought to the club by car from the villages of Northwold, Hockwold, Feltwell, Weeting and Stoke Ferry.
